titleStmt.title: Feareful neuues of thunder and lightning with the terrible effects thereof, which Almighty God sent on a place called Oluestone, in the county of Glocester the 28. of Nouember last : hauing prefixt before it, a short discourse, concerning two other admirable accidents that soone after ensued / truely related by P.S. ; and dedicated vnto the Kings Most Excellent Maiestie.
titleStmt.author: P. S.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by G. Eld, for Frauncis Burton,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Harvard University. Library.
